document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Soul </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">selects </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Society </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">shuts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Door </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">divine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Majority </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Present </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The soul selects her own society
